optic.dsp.core.clockSamplingInterp¶

clockSamplingInterp(x, Fs_in=1, Fs_out=1, jitter_rms=1e-09)¶

Interpolate signal to a given sampling rate.

Parameters

  • x (ndarray) -- Input signal.

  • param (core.parameter) --

    Resampling parameters:

    param.Fs_in : sampling frequency of the input signal. param.Fs_out : sampling frequency of the output signal. param.jitter_rms: standard deviation of the time jitter.

Returns

y -- Resampled signal.

Return type

ndarray
